title: Regulation No 164/67/EEC of the Commission of 26 June 1967 fixing the factors for calculating levies and sluice-gate prices for derived egg products
header:
REGULATION Nº 164/67/EEC OF THE COMMISSION  of 26 June 1967  fixing the factors for calculating levies and sluice-gate prices for derived egg products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY
main_body: The coefficients expressing the quantities and the ratio mentioned in Article 5 (1) of Regulation Nº 122/67/EEC are fixed as shown in column 3 of the Annex to this Regulation.  (1) OJ Nº 117, 19.6.1967, p. 2293/67.
The standard amount mentioned in Article 7 (4) of Regulation Nº 122/67/EEC is fixed as shown in column 4 of the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1967.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1967.
For the Commission
The President
Walter HALLSTEIN
ANNEX
